scripts.dev: concurrently --names "LIB,WEB,API" --prefix-colors "bgYellow,bgBlue,bgGreen" "pnpm --filter @rhiz.om/types dev" "pnpm --filter web dev" "NODE_ENV=development deno run --watch --allow-net --allow-env --allow-sys --allow-read --allow-run api/serve.ts | pnpm pino-pretty -c -t 'SYS:h:mm:ss.ltt' -i 'pid,hostname'"
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: deno lint && pnpm --filter web lint && pnpm --filter @rhiz.om/types lint
scripts.typecheck: deno check api/ && pnpm --filter @rhiz.om/types run build && pnpm --filter web run build
